            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $StateName == 'json_data' )
                        {
                              $Suffix = '';
                        }
                        
                        $FieldName = 'common_state_config_'.$StateName.$Suffix;
                        $FileName = 'cfcxs_'.$StateName.$Suffix;

                              $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_common_state_config(
